answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
I have given many presentations in the past.  Many have been approved, many modified and some rejected.  Proposals are supposed to be objective, showing both sides of an issue so that policy makers can make the best decision for your community.  Why not include that point of view in your presentation?

author: [Anonymous]
text: I am looking for best practices establised in communities that regulate whether a Council Member can make a formal presentation (powerpoint) challening an Administrative action.
title: City Council Member Presentations At City Council Meetings
